---
category: news
title: "Machine learning methods to predict amyloid positivity using domain scores from cognitive tests"
excerpt: "Accurately predicting A \\ (\\beta\\) status of participants by using machine learning (ML) models based on easily accessible data, could improve the effectiveness of AD clinical trials. We will develop optimal ML models for each subpopulation stratified by sex and disease stages using sub scores from screening neurological tests."
